trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around June 2nd 2012
divs: sighting detailscounted 9 flying lights over glen oaks, queens, ny on 6\2\12 around 10:30pm. definately no planes or helicopters. no sound. flying low and then going up. the lights could not have been larger than a couple of feet. my husband and i were walking the dog around 10:15p et when i saw the first light. at first i thought it might be a helicopter at the distance but e color of the lights was too orange to be an aircraft and when it got closer it looked too small (maybe 3 to 5 feet) and too quiet to be a helicopter. the first light was moving on an strainght line and same altitude and then started ascending and gliding on the same direction but on an ascending trajectory. at that moment i looked to the area where this object came from and another object was coming on a similar flight path and also started ascending in a similar flight pattern. after this second one more kept coming and i counted 9 in total. all of them followed a similar path and they all were like a minute or two appart. i took a video,of the last three. i could not attached the video from my ipad but i can e-mail it to you if you send me and e-mail and i can reply with it. i never saw how they dissapeared in the distance as i was always looking back for the next one to come by. i was very afraid since i had no idea what these were. i actually had dreams about extraterrestrial invasion to the earth last night. i would like to find outmwhat these were.
Summary: Counted 9 flying lights over Glen Oaks, Queens, NY on 6/2/12 around 10:30pm. Definately no planes or helicopters. No sound. Flying low and then going up. The lights could not have been larger than a couple of feet.
